description.other_details: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.

Australian absolute cardiovascular disease risk calculator [Internet]. Australia; National Vascular Disease Prevention Alliance; 2012. Available from: http://www.cvdcheck.org.au/.
Australian 5 year CVD risk calculator [Internet]. Australia; ASK-GP CRE (University of Sydney, Bond University); 2017. Available from: https://auscvdrisk.com.au/.

details.purpose: To record the results for each component parameter and their total sum for the Australian absolute CVD risk in the next 5 years.
details.use:
Use to record the results for each component parameter and their total sum for the Australian absolute CVD risk in the next 5 years.
The AusCVDRisk and NVDPA risk calculators in the references, below, share a common subset of data elements. The AusCVDRisk version has some additional data elements that have been included in this maximal data set.

items.items: Australian absolute cardiovascular disease risk calculator
An assessment tool used to calculate the absolute cardiovascular disease risk (CVD) in the next 5 years.
Default, unspecified point in time event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
Currently smoking or quite within last year.
Currently smoking or quit within last year.
Not currently smoking or quit longer than a year ago.
Recent test result for total cholesterol.
Recent test result for HDL cholesterol.
LVH is not present on ECG.
It is not known if LVH is present or absent on ECG.
Is the individual an aboriginal or Torres Strait islander?
Individual is an aboriginal or Torres Strait islander.
Individual is not an aboriginal or Torres Strait islander.
Additional information required to extend the model with local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: local information requirements; or additional metadata to align with FHIR.
